thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au | 2 of 76
thread.title: Justin

author: Justin
title: Justin
text:
Before needing to sell some tickets to a play I had no idea of the Ticketmaster resale system. When Google directed me there, I was pleasantly surprised to see this kind of initiative in place (a long time coming!)
I managed to put my 2x tickets up with great ease, and a week later received an automated email telling me my tickets had sold. Such a intuitive and simple system. Even going so far as to show users what the original purchase price was to help combat scalping = big tick!
Nice work Ticketmaster! A poor customer experinence I had a few years ago has now been turned around brilliantly.
